flawed_nl_solution:
The area of the largest room is 45 ft x 30 ft = <<45*30=1350>>1350 sq ft
The area of the smallest room is 15 ft x 8 ft = <<15*8=210>>210 sq ft
The difference between the two is 1350 sq ft - 210 sq ft = <<1350-210=1140>>1140 sq ft
#### 1140

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 120, not 210. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
